Address.value: 1045 PROGRESS CIRCLE, LAWRENCEVILLE, Georgia, 30043, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Boxlight Corp is a technology company focused on the education and learning industry. It designs, produces and distributes interactive projectors, 55, 65, 70, 75, and 86 4k interactive LED flat panels, technology, engineering and math (STEM) data logging products, and develops new products utilizing a combination of technologies of its subsidiaries, Boxlight and Globisens.
